item.title: Express solutions elegantly using your programming language
item.description: Introduction The post features a case study of a real life problem and the C# programming language. It explains how we went about trying to best express the solution within the bounds of the C# language. Although we use the C# programming language here,the ideas shared in this post aren’t specific to it and can be applied to any high level language you are working with. Problem Recently, for a customer requirement we had to work with a document that has both metadata and data.
